title: Colombia Sells $5 Billion of Global Bonds Ahead of Elections
description: Colombia raised nearly $5 billion in global bond markets ahead of pivotal congressional and presidential elections, joining other emerging-market governments that have rushed to lock in lower borrowing costs this month.
content: Colombia raised nearly $5 billion in global bond markets ahead of pivotal congressional and presidential elections, joining other emerging-market governments that have rushed to lock in lower borrowing costs this month.
